other_tests.findings: Absence of LH and FSH response to pulsatile GnRH administration; only small amplitude FAS pulses demonstrated partial resistance.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During chronic estrogen treatment, plasma FSH, LH, and FAS concentrations decreased, as did FAS responsiveness.

other_tests.findings: Low gonadotropin levels; only one LH pulse identified; estradiol levels remained low; no ovarian follicular development observed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: With estrogen treatment, a significant decrease in mean plasma LH and FSH concentrations was noted compared to earlier assessments.
